title: UBS veteran boss Ermotti may have pulled off the deal of the decade with the Credit Suisse rescue
content: After an intense weekend of negotiations in March 2023, UBS agreed to buy its embattled rival Credit Suisse. But not everyone was convinced it was a good idea.
summary: After an intense weekend of negotiations in March 2023, UBS agreed to buy its embattled rival Credit Suisse. But not everyone was convinced it was a good idea.

title: Oil prices to remain elevated as Middle East tensions threaten a wider conflict, CBA analyst warns
content: Brent is forecast to trade at $75 to $85 per barrel in September due to diminishing prospects of a truce in Gaza and an expected Iranian retaliation against Israel.
summary: Brent is forecast to trade at $75 to $85 per barrel in September due to diminishing prospects of a truce in Gaza and an expected Iranian retaliation against Israel.

title: Who is Telegram founder Pavel Durov — and why was he arrested?
content: The chief executive officer of Telegram, Pavel Durov, was arrested and placed in custody for alleged offenses related to the app, sources told AFP.
summary: The chief executive officer of Telegram, Pavel Durov, was arrested and placed in custody for alleged offenses related to the app, sources told AFP.

title: India wants be a developed nation by 2047 — but it has to tackle gender inequality first

title: Japan's yen has seen wild swings this year — is it still a safe-haven asset?

title: China slams U.S. for adding firms to export control list over alleged support for Russian military

title: Mike Lynch, man once dubbed 'Britain's Bill Gates,' dies at age 59
